original: 士氏為交州豪族，燮被舉孝廉，任交趾太守。其學問優博，達於從政，即使中原動盪，仍能保交州遠離戰亂。
text: Shi's family is a wealthy family in Jiaozhou, Xie was elected Xiaolian and served as Jiaozhi prefect. His knowledge is excellent, and he is good at politics. Even if the Central Plains is turbulent, he can still keep Jiaozhou away from war.
